name: Fuck this shit, I'm moving to the Arctic
name_original: Fuck this shit, I'm moving to the Arctic
description:
My first Bitsy game. 
There are 14 rooms in total and I stayed with the 3 color limitation, no audio.

This game is also linked from a NFC chip in my body, that feature is part of my research in new human-computer interfaces and I made this game to test this chip interface.

The story came as a reaction to the frustration of the past covid-year and moving to a new country with so many people and bureaucratic obstacles everywhere  that I just felt like moving away from everything, to a cold place as the summers in the Nordic are getting too warm for me because of global warming.
